txt.en: A tribe of Stone-giants appears to have taken up residence in the western hills above Evendim. While not so great in stature as their legendary cousins in the Misty Mountains, they are nevertheless powerful opponents when aroused and more than a match for any lone soldier.

You have taken the measure of the Stone-giants of Evendim -- and they are quite tall. You had always imagined that something so large could not possibly move very fast, but you have been disabused of that notion quickly enough.
